{% extends "base_doc.html" %} {% block doc_content %}

Download integrative dose-response information


Column name Description
cellosaurus_id Cell line ID according to Cellosaurus
drug_name Drug name
dataset "All" means all available datasets for a given drug-cell line pair
original_datasets A list of original datasets
n_dosage Number of testing concentrations
min_dosage Minimum concentration (uM)
max_dosage Maximum concentration (uM)
fitted_mae Mean absolute error of the integrative dose-response curve
slope A slope of the integrative dose-response curve
IC50_HDI_low A lower end of high density interval (95%) of IC50
IC50_HDI_high A higher end of high density interval (95%) of IC50
IC50 Drug concentration needed to inhibit the cells by 50%
IC90 Drug concentration needed to inhibit the cells by 90%
EC50 Half-maximal effective dosage
Einf Response at the highest drug dosage tested
AUC Area under the integrative dose-response curve
Last update: September 2022. The file includes 1,325 cell lines, 1,132 drugs and 829,782 drug-cell line pairs.
{% endblock %}
